formattedAddress: 13 E 69th St, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 13 E 69th St, New York, NY 10021-4901, USA

originalText.text: Shopped Tribeca for years, and more recently the Westbury popup, but I love this new location. The Armoury team have done a great job translating the presentation of the collection into a classic UES intimate and sophisticated setting. And, as always, fantastic service and products.

text.text: Shopped Tribeca for years, and more recently the Westbury popup, but I love this new location. The Armoury team have done a great job translating the presentation of the collection into a classic UES intimate and sophisticated setting. And, as always, fantastic service and products.

originalText.text:
Quite likely the best service of any menswear store in the city. Since most places Uptown have pretty good service, that’s saying A LOT!

The clothes themselves are great fabric and great fit. I bought off the rack, but most of the stores business seems to be made to order. I had also needed a somewhat obscure fabric for a shirt to go with a suit from another retailer. They knew the weave and directed me to the only store that would carry it. They know the whole landscape of high end menswear, and if they can’t help you they’ll direct you to who can. Phenomenal place to go if you’re in the market for menswear.

text.text:

originalText.text: I have been shopping at the TriBeCa location for over a decade. Westbury shop is a totally different but equally enjoyable experience. The team is always impeccably dressed, polite and helpful. I am proud to say that I have been introduced to some of my favorite makers by the Armoury Team. Further, everyone goes above and beyond to provide superlative customer service. My friends were in from out of state and left a coat behind. The team was proactive and helpful in shipping the misplaced items back. Class all the way.

The team was proactive and helpful in shipping the misplaced items back. Class all the way.

originalText.text: I only started working with these guys recently, but had known of the online shop.  Their curated selection really is great.  And they are all very helpful.  I went in the first few times and didn't buy a thing.  There was never any pressure and they were always kind and helpful.  This is really a gem in the men's tailoring game.  If your thinking of elevating your wardrobe these guys know how to do it.  Ask for Michael.

originalText.text: Wonderful shopping experience with true professionals. I've been in the shop a few times, never any pressure to buy, but hard to resist the wonderful clothing. Michael and Dan were very helpful. Will geek-out with you on clothes as much or as little as you'd like. The best men's shop on the UES and one of the tops in NYC...
